= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Face - corrugator supercilii muscle (face-corrugator-supercilii-muscle)*: wrinkles forehead
  * *Face - depressor supercilii muscle (face-depressor-supercilii-muscle)*: depression of eyebrow
  * *Face - levator labii superioris muscle (face-levator-labii-superioris-muscle)*: elevates the upper lip
  * *Face - orbicularis oculi muscle, zygomatic (face-orbicularis-oculi-muscle)*: closes the eyelids
  * *Face - zygomaticus major muscle, proper (face-zygomaticus-major-muscle-proper)*: draws angle of mouth upward and laterally
  * *Face - frontalis muscle (face-frontalis-muscle)*: raises the eyebrows
  * *Face - occipitalis muscle (face-occipitalis-muscle)*: moves the scalp back
  * *Face - platysma muscle (face-platysma-muscle)*: draws the corners of the mouth inferiorly and widens it (as in expressions of sadness and fright). Also draws the skin of the neck superiorly when teeth are clenched
  * *Face - face skin (face-skin)*: sensory fibers from the skin
  * *Face - parotid skin (face-parotid-skin)*: facial skin over the parotid gland
  * *Face - occipitofrontal muscles (face-occipitofrontal-muscles)*: move the scalp
